title: Child accidentally shot in Marion County
content:
MARION COUNTY, MS (WDAM) -
A child was accidentally shot in Marion County Wednesday night, according to the Marion County Sheriff's Department.
Deputies responded to a call around 6:00 p.m. to a house in the Hub community.
When deputies arrived on scene, they were told that the wounds were non life threatening and that the shooting was an accident.
The sheriff's department is investigating, and said there are no further details to release at this time.
No charges have been filed.
